name: Super Hang Up
description:
Arcade action? Maybe. Jam ends in less than 2 hours and it is half an hour past my bedtime and that's being generous to when I should go to bed. Will fill this page out sometime tomorrow.

Can be played on the Museum of ZZT in the meantime at https://museumofzzt.com/file/play/super-hang-up/ or by downloading the file and running it with ZZT v3.2 or any compatible engine.
